title: DO-99-001: Employee Acceptance of Commercial Discounts and Benefits under the Standards of Ethical Conduct, 5 C.F.R. Part 2635
summary:
OGE sets forth a framework for analyzing discounts issues and addresses the regulatory provisions that have particular relevance to discounts issues.  

Notes: [The guidance in this advisory that pertains to certain frequent flyer program benefits earned from Government-financed travel no longer reflects current law.]
